Name: Wane Cuirass
Description:
Seems to gain higher agility attributes.

[This gear's advanced attributes will not include mastery]
Description2$english:
Handcrafted to perfection—though devoid of rare attributes, every detail is imbued with the artisan's soul.

Crafted by a renowned armorsmith from Asterleeds, this armor combines exceptional flexibility with expansive defensive coverage.

NeedMaterial.Name: Tough Soft Leather
NeedMaterial.Description: A flax-spun material utilized in woven fabrications,
NeedMaterial.Description2$english: Fish oil-treated leather made from sanded and stitched animal hides for enhanced flexibility.

recipes.Name: Tough Soft Leather
recipes.Des: Fish oil-treated leather made from sanded and stitched animal hides for enhanced flexibility.

NeedMaterial.Name: Durable Animal Hides
NeedMaterial.Description: A field-harvested resource that can be reprocessed by life professions.
NeedMaterial.Description2$english: This resilient leather hide offers premium tactile performance!

NeedMaterial.Name: Alum
NeedMaterial.Description: Collected resource that can be processed further with Life Skills.
NeedMaterial.Description2$english: White natural alum serves as a key raw material in the production of deodorants and leather tanning agents.

NeedMaterial.Name: Refined Fish Oil
NeedMaterial.Description: A cooking byproduct, primarily used in leatherworking.
NeedMaterial.Description2$english: A superior fish oil rendered from select species, yielding exceptional purity using higher-quality raw materials.

recipes.Name: Refined Fish Oil
recipes.Des: A superior fish oil rendered from select species, yielding exceptional purity using higher-quality raw materials.

NeedMaterial.Name: Season Pass EXP (Not counted toward weekly limit)
NeedMaterial.Description:
Earned by completing daily activity goals. Once enough EXP is accumulated, your Season Pass level increases.
Higher Season Pass levels grant generous rewards.
Season Pass EXP earned does not count toward the weekly limit.

NeedMaterial.Description2$english: Cotton-spun thread refined through advanced weaving technology.

recipes.Name: Worsted Yarn ×3
recipes.Des: Cotton-spun thread refined through advanced weaving technology.

NeedMaterial.Name: Cotton
NeedMaterial.Description: Collected resource that can be processed further with Life Skills.
NeedMaterial.Description2$english: Cotton-derived fibers serve as a vital raw material in the weaving profession.

recipes.Name: Brass Ingot

NeedMaterial.Description2$english: A copper ore of relatively high purity.

NeedMaterial.Name: Zinc Ore

NeedMaterial.Name: Engram Dust Crystals
NeedMaterial.Description:
An exceptionally rare collected resource.
The higher level of the gatherable, the greater the chance of obtaining it. It is subject to a weekly acquisition limit.
NeedMaterial.Description2$english: A rare crystal shimmering with starlight.

NeedMaterial.Name: High-Density Alloy Shard
NeedMaterial.Description: After collecting enough High-Density Alloy Shard, you can go to the Artisan Guild and exchange them for level 60 purple quality gear at the gear forging Artisan Harvey.
NeedMaterial.Description2$english: This alloy is smelted from materials from powerful monsters and rare minerals, capable of reacting to Engram and emitting a flickering glow. Due to its unique research value, it is highly favored by experts on the Bapharian Legacy.
